summary: A man pursues a woman who is already engaged and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a bitter separation that threatens to destroy their relationship forever.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Rani Mukerji|Jas Arora|Satish Shah|Jayshree T.|Rajeev Verma|Lillete Dubey|Johnny Lever|Jameel Khan|Suresh Menon|Haidar Ali|Suresh Bhagwat|Dinyar Tirandaz|Masood Akhtar|Govind Khatri|Aafaq|Gagan Gupta|Satish Nagpal|Sushmita Daan|Gil Mansukhani|Arun Verma|Arun Singh|Athar Nawaaz|Kamini Khanna|Mukesh Ahuja|Vishwajeet Pradhan|Naveen Bawa|Ashish Kapoor|Howard Rosemeyer|Bobby Darling|Vani Tripathi|Juhi Jawaid|Meghna Malik|Madhavi Chopra|Daljit Soundh|Aditya Pancholi
title: Chalte Chalte
